thread.section_title: Soho Grand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Steampunk meets Industrial Posh
thread.title_full: Steampunk meets Industrial Posh - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Philipp T
title: Steampunk meets Industrial Posh
text:
I stayed here 2 nights on business. Right from getting out of the cab to the last time i walked out of the doors the helpful and courteous staff was there with a smile. The Hotel is industrial / Steampunk posh...Beautiful property with old time wood panels and chicken wire safety glass mirrored closet walls. Old photos of local attractions adorn the walls. Old fashioned wall lighting and a tiled bathroom right out of the 30's-40's. Big Dark and beautiful adornment galore...one of my favorite Hotels.
Room Tip: walking distance to Mott St. See more room tips
